name: equationally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to, uses, or involves equations (= statements in which you show that two amounts are equal using mathematical symbols): This relationship can be expressed equationally. An algebraic system is equationally defined if its structure is defined by a set of finite operations. Related word
equational
More examplesFewer examplesThese systems cannot be equationally defined. This theory can be called equationally complete.These techniques can be used to check the equationally specified programs.
